definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

sentences.english: Thanks to my shake-proof shoes, I can still stand and sit here.
sentences.chinese: 多虧了我的防震鞋，我還能站在你面前做着在這裏。

sentences.english: The eggs are packed in cartons with beehives lined with shake-proof paper board.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋要用帶蜂房孔，外襯防震紙板的紙箱包裝。

sentences.english: An earthquake drill can teach your family what to do in an earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 防震演習可以讓你們全家知道如何應對地震。

sentences.english: Fourth, we completely revised the Law on Protecting Against and Mitigating Earthquake Disasters.
sentences.chinese: 四是全面修訂防震減災法。

sentences.english: Revision of the plans for protecting against and mitigating earthquake disasters shall be submitted for approval to the authorities that originally approved them.
sentences.chinese: 修改防震減災規劃，應當報經原批准機關批准。

sentences.english: For the romantic, there are shockproof wine glasses.
It is also used as quakeproof material and products requiring excellent low temperature property.
sentences.chinese: 還可以用於各種耐寒性要求高的製品和用作防震材料。

sentences.english: We should stress emphasis on quake drills and the structure of buildings on ordinary days.
sentences.chinese: 我們平時應注意防震演習和建物的結構。

sentences.english: Shockproof, ruggedized design protects from drops up to 5 feet.
sentences.chinese: 防震，耐用的設想能夠避免跌落到5英尺。

sentences.english: The eggs are packed in cartons lined with shockproof corrugated paperboard.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋將使用防震的瓦楞紙排列於紙箱內包裝。

sentences.english: Earthquake, she just finished a shock lesson.
sentences.chinese: 地震發生時，她剛上完一節防震課。

sentences.english: Actually this packing is both shockproof and damp-proof .
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這種包裝既防震又防潮。

sentences.english: CAGE CLAMP spring pressure connection technology provides vibration-proof and maintenance-free terminations.
sentences.chinese: 籠式彈簧壓力連接技術提供了防震和免費維護終端。

sentences.english: All the above methods are part of precautionary measures, which is generally called technology of earthquake prevention.
sentences.chinese: 以上均屬於預防性的措施，統稱爲防震科技。

sentences.english: Earthquake prevention technology of Chinese historical timber buildings is greatly unique.
sentences.chinese: 木結構古建的防震技術非常獨特。

definition: disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
